summary: Italian-born Massimo and Lella Vignelli are among the world's most influential designers. Throughout their long career, their motto has been, 'If you can't find it, design it' The work ... See full summary Â»
cast: Paola Antonelli|Barry Bergdoll|Michael Bierut|Peter Eisenman|Milton Glaser|Jessica Helfand|Steven Heller|Richard Meier|Lella Vignelli|Massimo Vignelli
title: Design Is One: The Vignellis
